Database Managament Systems

Delivered by:

Prof. Mamatha Jadhav
CSE Department
MS Ramaiah Institute of Technology
Store very large numbers of records efficiently
Quickly and easily find information
Easily add new data and to edit or delete old data
Previous Next

Introduction to NoSQL database MongoDB

A 3 week long lab course on the most popular NoSQL database MongoDB, covering basic CRUD(Create, Retreive, Update, Delete) operations and intermediate-level operations like aggregation, replica sets, map-reduce, sorting etc.

Instructors: Anirudh Singh Shekhawat and Vikram S
